content.notes: Content not refactored in Phase 1; original preserved under payload.

layout_template.notes: Layout based on the Africa_ADayInTheLife.jpg draft (layout reference only; character content populated from new_prompts.xlsx + Asia.docx).

header.notes: Handwritten/script title at top-left over a muted world-map background.

grid.notes: Each character row = left info panel + 6 image cards. Each card has a square photo above a short caption.

characters.name: Anjali

label.headline: Anjali
label.subhead: A Girl from Rural Rajasthan, India
label.notes: Left-side info panel: small flag icon above the character name; subhead directly below.

characters.bio_short: Anjali is a 16-year-old girl from rural Rajasthan, India. Indian culture is diverse, but in rural Rajasthan, traditions, community, and extended family life are prominent.

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: I dust the pan with flour; the sweet smell of chapatis makes my stomach growl and my heart smile.

image.alt_text: Anjali: Rajasthan village kitchen at dawn (India).

scenes.caption_first_person: Rain soaks my shoes, but puddle-hopping with my friends turns the gray street into a playground.

characters.name: Batbayar

label.headline: Batbayar
label.notes: Left-side info panel: small flag icon above the character name; subhead directly below.

characters.bio_short: Batbayar is a 35-year-old nomadic herder in Mongolia's steppe region. Mongolian nomadic culture revolves around herding (sheep, goats, yaks, horses) and living in a ger, a portable round tent home.

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: I breathe clouds in the dark, patting each yakâ€™s warm flank as stars fade.

characters.name: Min-seo

label.headline: Min-seo
label.subhead: A Young Professional in South Korea
label.notes: Left-side info panel: small flag icon above the character name; subhead directly below.

characters.bio_short: Min-seo is a 28-year-old young professional living in Seoul, South Korea. South Korean urban culture blends deep-rooted traditions with hyper-modern city life.

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: Earbuds in, I ride the train; petals whirl outside like pink confetti for the new day.
